entry.title: Re The first CBC cycle begins today, @Melvillius will be guiding us through the Uniswap v3 contracts, specifically the contract that implements swappi...
entry.summary: Re The first CBC cycle begins today, @Melvillius will be guiding us through the Uniswap v3 contracts, specifically the contract that implements swapping and adding/removing liquidity. So head on over to cbc-start-here, react to the emoji and let's get started.

entry.title: Re Don't like Discord or you're not a D_D member yet? No problem, join the CBC Twitter Community, updates will flow there as well. You'll still be abl...
entry.summary: Re Don't like Discord or you're not a D_D member yet? No problem, join the CBC Twitter Community, updates will flow there as well. You'll still be able to keep up with the workshop and guides https://twitter.com/i/communities/1539342595800825857

entry.title: Re CBC is only open to members of Developer DAO and Macro, for now. Just head on over to cbc-start-here and react to the emoji to get the CBC role, yo...
entry.summary: Re CBC is only open to members of Developer DAO and Macro, for now. Just head on over to cbc-start-here and react to the emoji to get the CBC role, you should then see the other CBC-related channels. In the future, CBC will be fully open to any anon.

entry.title: Re On the Tuesdays in between workshops (recall workshops are every 2 weeks), we'll meet in the cbc-voice channel to do a synchronous study session. S...
entry.summary: Re On the Tuesdays in between workshops (recall workshops are every 2 weeks), we'll meet in the cbc-voice channel to do a synchronous study session. Sessions will be recorded and uploaded to the D_D Youtube channel.

entry.title: Re CBC will be coordinated by @tonyolendo and @Melvillius, they will be in-charge of running CBC and ensuring continuity, feel free to ask them any qu...
entry.summary: Re CBC will be coordinated by @tonyolendo and @Melvillius, they will be in-charge of running CBC and ensuring continuity, feel free to ask them any questions. @Melvillius is the lead instructor at Macro.

entry.title: Re In between synchronous meetings, participants will study the protocol on their own, and use the cbc-general channel in the D_D discord to ask quest...
entry.summary: Re In between synchronous meetings, participants will study the protocol on their own, and use the cbc-general channel in the D_D discord to ask questions and get them answered by others

entry.title: Re We'll meet every 2 weeks on Tuesdays 4:00pm PST - 5:30pm PST synchronously for a workshop on a selected protocol. Expect a detailed teardown and in...
entry.summary: Re We'll meet every 2 weeks on Tuesdays 4:00pm PST - 5:30pm PST synchronously for a workshop on a selected protocol. Expect a detailed teardown and in-depth reviews of engineering stacks, smart contracts and more.

entry.title: Re CBC is an Ethereum Developer Education initiative in partnership with @0xMacroDAO CBC is designed to help engineers learn more about protocols in w...
entry.summary: Re CBC is an Ethereum Developer Education initiative in partnership with @0xMacroDAO CBC is designed to help engineers learn more about protocols in web3 by meeting periodically to discuss those protocols. How does it work?

entry.title: Are you stuck in Solidity purgatory? Do you understand the basics but not entirely sure how to get to Defi Quant levels? or do you just want to be a s...
entry.summary: Are you stuck in Solidity purgatory? Do you understand the basics but not entirely sure how to get to Defi Quant levels? or do you just want to be a security focused smart contract developer? Then we might have something for you. We are pleased to announce Contract Book Club 🧵
